title: Sokki Poraandi Song Lyrics Mupparimanam
stanzas: <div>Sokki Poraandi Song Lyrics Mupparimanam

Sokki poraandi
vikki poraandi
un kannil vilundhaane
nooru tharam.

chekka sevvaanam
vetkapadum podhu
un kannathai kadanvaanga
oadi varum.

Koththodu kilaiyodu
poo pookkum vaasam pol
kaathodu un swasam
thaedi poren.

kulasaaami thiruneeru
vachchaalum silirkkaama
nee thotta anganga
silirthuporen.

un kanjaada asaivukkum
kaal kolusu nelivukkum
adi podi kodasaanji ponen

nee paakkaatha nerathil
naan unna paarthuthaan
nee parkumpodhu
ala paanji poren.

ye theekkuchi thalamela
baaratha pola en
nenjodu oru baaram
thanthaayadaa

en thookkatha palanaalum
nee vaangi pora
naan paduthaalum
kanavodu vandhaayadi

Sokki poraandi
vikki poraandi
un kannil vilundhaane
nooru tharam.

chekka sevvaanam
vetkapadum podhu
un kannathai kadanvaanga
oadi varum.

Ye panjaarathu vedakozhi pola
en nenjoram un vasam
thulluthadi
Ye panjaangathil
naal paakka solli
un kannoram
kadha pesi solluthadi

en kadhorathil
thinam patchi vandhu
thinam un pera
sollithaan koovuthadaa

ye thodum thoorathil
nee varumpodhellaam
naan vidum moochu
analaaga kolluthadi

panjaala melathaan
thee mootti poriye
ayyayyo anganga
eriyuthadi.

anjaaru muththatha
nee thandhu ponaiyina
ahhaahaa en yaekkam
anaiyumadi

Sokki poraandi
vikki poraandi
un kannil vilundhaane
nooru tharam.

chekka sevvaanam
vetkapadum podhu
un kannathai kadanvaanga
oadi varum.

Hey unkooda thaan
thinam priyaamathaan
ada naan vazha varam
ondru venumadaa

ye unmaarbil thaan
iru kanmoodi thaan
naan thoonga idam onnu
venumadaa

hey aagaasathil
oru meththa poatu
anga unkooda vilaiyaada
thonuthadi

ye aananthathil en
kaalu rendu
en pecha ketkaama
thulluthadi

kedikaaram illaama
nodineram oadaama
ingaeye ippodhe
nindraal enna.

madimeedhu naan saaya
thaayaaga nee maari
thaalaatu paatondru
sonnaal enna

Sokki poraandi
vikki poraandi
un kannil vilundhaane
nooru tharam.

chekka sevvaanam
vetkapadum podhu
un kannathai kadanvaanga
oadi varum.

seo.description: Get the complete Sokki Poraandi Song Lyrics Mupparimanam from Mupparimanam. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by GV PrakashKumar and sung by Al Rufin. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Mupparimanam, GV PrakashKumar, Al Rufin, Malavika Sundar, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
